GV05mandup_u:0: oṃ ity etad akṣaram idaṃ sarvaṃ tasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad iti sarvam oṃkāra eva |
GV05mandup_u:1: yac cānyat trikālātītaṃ tad apy oṃkāra eva || MandUp_1 ||
GV05mandup_u:2: sarvaṃ hy etad brahmāyam ātmā brahma so 'yam ātmā catuṣpāt || MandUp_2 ||
GV05mandup_u:3: jāgaritasthāno bahiḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ sthūlabhug vaiśvānaraḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ svaprasthāno 'ntaḥprajñaḥ saptāṅga ekonaviṃśatimukhaḥ praviviktabhuktaijaso dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ yatra supto na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati tat suṣuptam |
GV05mandup_u:4: suṣuptasthāna ekībhūtaḥ prajñānaghana evāndamayo hy ānandabhukcetomukhaḥ prājñaḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ eṣaḥ sarveśvara eṣa sarvajña eṣo 'ntaryāmy eṣa yoniḥ sarvasya
GV05mandup_u:6: nāntaḥprajñaṃ na bahiḥprajñaṃ nobhayataḥprajñaṃ na prajñānaghanaṃ na prajñaṃ nāprajñam |
GV05mandup_u:7: adṛṣṭam avyavahāryam agrāhyam alakṣaṇam acintyam avyapadeśyam ekātmapratyayasāraṃ prapañcopaśamaṃ śāntaṃ śivam advaitaṃ caturthaṃ manyante |
GV05mandup_u:10: adhimātraṃ pādā mātrā mātrāśca pādā akāra ukāro makāra iti || MandUp_8 ||
GV05mandup_u:11: jāgaritasthāno vaiśvānaraḥ akāraḥ prathamā mātrāpterādimattvād vā |
GV05mandup_u:12: āpnoti ha vai sarvān kāmān ādiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_9 ||
GV05mandup_u:13: svapnasthānas taijasa ukāro dvitīyā mātrotkarṣād ubhayatvād vā |
GV05mandup_u:16: nāsyābrahmavit kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_10 ||
GV05mandup_u:17: suṣuptasthānaḥ prājño makāraḥ tṛtīyā mātrā miter apīter vā |
GV05mandup_u:18: minoti ha vā idaṃ sarvam apītiś ca bhavati ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_11 ||
GV05mandup_u:21: saṃviśaty ātmanātmānaṃ ya evaṃ veda || MandUp_12 ||
